about_the_game:
RIVALS MECH PACK - 2 HEROES

ROUGHNECK - BOLT
  • 1 Hero 'Mech with a custom pattern, and a +30% C-Bill boost
  • - RGH-BLT (S)
  • 1 'Mech bay included

SUN SPIDER - AMBUSH
  • 1 Hero 'Mech with a custom pattern, and a +30% C-Bill boost
  • - SNS-AMB (S)
  • 1 'Mech bay included

IN ADDITION TO THE TWO HERO 'MECHS, THE RIVALS PACK INCLUDES CONSUMABLE BOOSTS AND CURRENCIES!
  • 30 Days Premium Time
  • 6.5 Million C-Bills
  • 200 GSP
  • 3000 MC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel: Core 2 Duo E7300 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD: Athlon 64 X2 6400+ @ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: 8800 GT / AMD: Radeon HD 5670
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 45GB temporarily required during installation
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel: Core i5-3470 @ 3.20 GHz / AMD: FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: GeForce GTX 660 / AMD: Radeon HD 7870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 MB available space

short_description: Rivals Pack Features 2 Hero Mechs, the Roughtneck Bolt, and the Sunspider Ambush. Along with the 2 Hero Mechs, the Rivals pack includes 30 Days Premium Time, 6.5 Million C-Bills, 200 GSP, and 3000 MC.
